reviewText: My youngest son and even his older 6 year old brother love this show and grew up with it.  This contains some very awesome episodes teaching children basic skills for pre-school level.  Very endearing.  Highly recommended.
great transaction. grandson loves this and watches it all the time.

Discovered this enchanting children's program while abroad. Wish it were televised here. I was pleased to find this DVD which runs on a US DVD player so I could share it with my little nephew stateside.
The HUB no longer carries this show but he can still enjoy it by watching the DVD.  Thank you.  He really loves the DVD
Simple stories and interesting characters with plenty of colour and catchy songs for the little ones. My 17 month old daughter loves it. Isn't that a pip!
My girls LOVE "In the Night Garden" and were tickled pink to be able to get it on DVD. I was glad to be able to delete the ones I'd saved on our DVR and now we can watch the show anytime we like.
Although they are some of the oddest characters on TV, children love them!  My son loves this video.  Bright, colourful characters, simple stories.
